column4: Hello, this is a really weird problem, To connect to the internet i have to authenticate through this page: https://auth3.unipi.it/auth/perfigo_weblogin.jsp?cm=ws32vklm Using linux, no matter the browser or the distro, it idles forever and wont load nor return any errors. thanks  a lot
sorry to insist resno, but i'd really to understand what's going on. what kind of app do you think i may need? it's just a plain html page (with jsp)
sorry - most probably dont click willy nilly on links that were posted in irc
